name: Stickman Escape
storyline: The big fiends in every age have their own childhood memories, and these so-called "childhood memories" have also changed over time and kept pace with the times. Stickman Escape cleverly integrates these elements, so that every player can inadvertently reminisce about his childhood, and can't help but smile.
summary: Stickman Escape is a funny adventure-puzzle game. The complicated and confusing story was starting alone with the stickman caught by an unknown man. You have to make different decision during the story which will lead to the different end, even hide end. Come with stickman to your adventure!
